tool_description: Translating English or numbers words to Swahili.
name: Swenapi
title: Swenapi

api_list.name: en-sw
api_list.description: Translate an English words to Swahili
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://swenapi.p.rapidapi.com/en-sw/go"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "swenapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://swenapi.p.rapidapi.com/en-sw/{word}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "swenapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: sw-num
api_list.description: Translate any number to Swahili words
api_list.code:

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://swenapi.p.rapidapi.com/sw-num/{num}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "swenapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
